feed.title: Little Grand Rapids - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 p.m. CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
